ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You are calling them to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You are surely calling them to the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You are calling them to a Straight Way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), you certainly have called them to the right path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed you call them to the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And certainly, you call them to the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely you invite them to a right way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Assuredly thou art calling them to a straight path;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! thou summonest them indeed unto a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and, most surely, you are calling them to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily thou! thou callest them unto a Path straight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed you invite them to a straight path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But verily thou callest them to the Straight Way;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And certainly, you (O Muhammad SAW) call them to a Straight Path (true religion Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed you are calling them to a Straight Path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You are inviting them to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:73] And truly you summon them to a straight path, a [straight] route, that is, the religion of Islam.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! thou) Muhammad (summonest them indeed unto a right path) to an established religion which Allah is pleased with: Islam.
